text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a REFB

name: ParticipationReferredBy
title: ParticipationReferredBy
description:
A participant (e.g. provider) who has referred the subject of an act (e.g. patient).

Typically, a referred by participant will provide a report (e.g. referral).
